mapper.select: select count(*) from student where student_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student ( student_id,student_num,dept_id, student_name,student_birthday,student_email, student_img,student_password,student_phone, student_status ) VALUES ( #{studentId},#{studentNum},#{deptId}, #{studentName},#{studentBirthday},#{studentEmail}, #{studentImg},#{studentPassword},#{studentPhone}, #{studentStatus} )
mapper.update: update student set student_status=#{studentStatus} where student_id = #{studentId} and dept_id = #{deptId} and student_name = #{studentName}
mapper.select: select student_status from student where student_id=#{val}
